body.plain:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for reaching out. I’m currently away on extended holiday and not taking new clients. You’re welcome to check back in a few months, though nothing is guaranteed.

Kindly,
Julia

Hi Alex,

Thanks for reaching out. I’m currently away on extended holiday and not taking new clients. You’re welcome to check back in a few months, though nothing is guaranteed.
